content.html: I’m a complete atheist but also fully support other’s religious beliefs. I do however, despise, how—particularly in the west—conservative politicians use religion to remove basic rights from fellow humans. This is when I hate religion.
content.value:
I’m a complete atheist but also fully support other’s religious beliefs.

I do however, despise, how—particularly in the west—conservative politicians use religion to remove basic rights from fellow humans. This is when I hate religion.
